channel.title: python on Hexgolems
channel.description: Recent content in python on Hexgolems

item.title: Fast Cov
item.description: A fast binary coverage measurement tool based on AFL’s Qemu mode

item.title: Grimoire
item.description: Automatically infer grammar like fragments during normal feedback fuzzing to improve test coverage. Published at USENIX Security 2019.

item.title: Redqueen
item.description: A binary fuzzer that automatically solves magic Bytes and checksums during fuzzing. Published at NDSS 2019.

item.title: Syntia
item.description: Uses program synthesis to deobfuscate VM instruction handlers used by obfuscators such as VMProtect and Themida. Published at USENIX Security 2017.

item.title: kAFL
item.description: An AFL style feedback fuzzer, that uses Intel-PT to trace operating systems without access to sourcecode. Published at USENIX Security 2017

item.title: SMT Solver Workshop
item.description: A one day workshop on using SMT-Solvers and bounded model checker for reverse engineering and binary analysis.
